story1.title: Community Gardens Project
story1.description: Transforming vacant lots into thriving community spaces that bring neighbors together and provide fresh produce for local families.

story2.title: Youth Leadership Program
story2.description: Empowering young voices to lead change in their communities through mentorship, skills training, and civic engagement.

story3.title: Digital Inclusion Initiative
story3.description: Bridging the digital divide by providing technology access and digital literacy training to underserved communities.
